org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.tasks
Interface FileListingSpec

All Superinterfaces:
FileBrowserTaskSpec, FileTaskSpec, TaskSpec
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseFileListingSpec
public interface FileListingSpec
extends FileBrowserTaskSpec

Describes a file listing task to perform. The file listing task will list the files at the specified file location.

Method Summary

          Returns whether to return "." and ".." in file list" or not.

          Returns the file set to be listed.

getBrowserFlag

public boolean getBrowserFlag()
Returns whether to return "." and ".." in file list" or not.
